mapper.select: SELECT A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_DT, B.DEPT_NM AS RQST_DEPT_NM, C.COMM_NM AS RQST_GRD_NM, DTL.GRD_CD as rqst_grd_cd, A.RQST_EMP_NO, D.EMP_NM AS RQST_EMP_NM, E.DEPT_NM , A.EMP_CLS, A.EMP_NO , F.EMP_NM , G.COMM_NM AS GRD_NM, A.HOPE_DT, A.SEX_DIST, A.CELL_PON_NO, A.TEL_NO, A.CLS, A.HRM_FRM_DT, A.HRM_TO_DT, A.FRM_DT, A.TO_DT, H.ROOM_NM, I.APV_STAT_CD, A.ACT_DT FROM GEN_DORM_RQST A LEFT OUTER JOIN HRM_DEPT B ON A.RQST_DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN HRM_BAS_DTL DTL ON A.RQST_EMP_NO=DTL.EMP_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_STD_MGT C ON DTL.GRD_CD =C.COMM_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN HRM_BAS_MGT D ON A.RQST_EMP_NO=D.EMP_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN HRM_DEPT E ON A.DEPT_CD=E.DEPT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN HRM_BAS_MGT F ON A.EMP_NO=F.EMP_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN HRM_BAS_DTL DTL2 ON A.EMP_NO=DTL2.EMP_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_STD_MGT G ON DTL2.GRD_CD=G.COMM_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN GEN_DORM H ON A.ROOM_NO = H.ROOM_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_RQST_NO I ON A.RQST_NO = I.RQST_NO WHERE A.RQST_NO=#{rqstNo}
